item.title: Idea Makers by Stephen Woldfram
item.description: I just read the book Idea Makers: Personal Perspectives on the lives Ideas of some notable People by Stephen Wolfram and it is amazing. Here some of my takeaways John von Newumann: when John died He left his daughter a Box that should be opened on the 50th anniversary of his death, his Daughter emailed Stephen that disappointingly the box was not John von Newman’s at all! There is a lot much more about Ada Lovelace, the first programmer.
